channel.title: Help
channel.description: Hello, Since silab client is now done..... I've been working on getting a client for my server..... but thats not the problem, the problem is when i try to run my client it says somthing like ""Java" Not recongnized as an internal or external command." i have the newest jdk... the newest jre (6U13 for jdk and jre) i dont know what to do. help if you can. thanks

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

Hello, Since silab client is now done… I’ve been working on getting a client for my server… but thats not the problem, the problem is when i try to run my client it says somthing like ““Java” Not recongnized as an internal or external command.” i have the newest jdk… the newest jre (6U13 for jdk and jre) i dont know what to do. help if you can. thanks
